description:
Summary score for Patient Health Questionnaire 9-item. Each item is scored from 0 to 3, while the total score range from 0 to 27. The PHQ-9 score can be divided into the following categories of increasing severity: minimal (0-4), mild (5-9), moderate (10-14), moderately severe (15-19), and severe (20-27). [Kroenke K et al. 2001 (PubMED ID: 11556941)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1495268/)

[Search for all PHQ-9 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/heartbeat/variables?search=phq9)
